amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to repeal the statutory requirement for the Defense Department to submit unfunded priorities lists to Congress.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to repeal the statutory requirement for the Defense Department to submit unfunded priorities lists to Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A011) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 155 - 272 (Roll no. 318).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A011) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Jayapal.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A011) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 155 - 272 (Roll no. 318).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A011) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 155 - 272 (Roll no. 318).
